lead_paragraph: Kris Jenkins buried a buzzer-beating three-pointer to lift Villanova to a thrilling 77-74 upset victory over North Carolina in the NCAA Final to win the U.S. college basketball championship in Houston on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Dramatic Late Basket Earns Villanova NCAA Title
headline.main: Dramatic Late Basket Earns Villanova NCAA Title

snippet: Kris Jenkins buried a buzzer-beating three-pointer to lift Villanova to a thrilling 77-74 upset victory over North Carolina in the NCAA Final to win the U.S. college basketball championship in Houston on Monday....
